# Ergonomic Resources

The Econometrics Laboratory (EML) in conjunction with the Department of
Economics will try to provide ergonomic accommodations whenever
possible. It is the responsibility of users to seek assistance in
maintaining a heathly work environment. Users must be pro-active and
take appropriate measures to prevent Repetitive Stress Injuries (RSI).
The following is a synopsis of services and facilities that are
available to users.

## Accommodations

Room 616: Fully adjustable chairs, Adjustable tables

## Software

xwrits: reminds you to take wrist breaks

## Additional Information

Literature is available in the computer labs in the document racks. More
ergonomic information can be found at [University Health
Services](http://www.uhs.berkeley.edu/facstaff/Ergonomics/index.htm).
